title: In two games at once (same account)
body: So i was playing Solo q and then I got dc'd 7:22 into the game... I close my client, relog, and when i log in the client says im not in game. I'm able to join another queue and start a whole new game... Why can't reconnect into my game??? I started another game right now, this time flex, so my account is in two games at once... WTF @Riot

replies.body: When you exited the first game, it was most likely due to the game crashing on the server side so it was as if the game never happened. You were able to immediately re-queue for the second match, so you were only ever in the one match at a time, and nobody will have received penalties for the game that was dropped.
update: apparently the game just dropped so its like it never existed... feelsbadman cuz we were stomping :(
